name: Bi101 Consultants
description:
Business Intelligence 101 is the leading Google Apps & NetSuite cloud provider for Bay Area Software Companies. 
We've helped hundreds of Software Companies move to the cloud from their legacy systems. We can deliver companies lower costs, increased productivity, and streamlined IT processes. Companies get full service set up and maintenance from an experienced team of consultants. 
Our Google solutions include: 
Google Apps On-Demand Communication & Collaboration Tools 
Postini Email Solutions -Hosted Security, Archiving Service 
Hosted Message Encryption Service 
Our NetSuite solutions include: 
NetSuite Financials: Manage your accounting/enterprise resource planning 
NetSuite CRM+: Drive sales, manage customers/leads, and maximize ROI 
NetSuite Ecommerce: Bring your business online and deploying your website 
Integrate NetSuite and Google Apps for increased productivity.
READ MORE...
